mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `LCAPRolePerMapping_79f632` INNER JOIN `LCAPPermission_79f632` ON `LCAPRolePerMapping_79f632`.`permissionId` = `LCAPPermission_79f632`.`id` INNER JOIN `LCAPPerResMapping_79f632` ON `LCAPPermission_79f632`.`id` = `LCAPPerResMapping_79f632`.`permissionId` INNER JOIN `LCAPResource_79f632` ON `LCAPPerResMapping_79f632`.`resourceId` = `LCAPResource_79f632`.`id`
`LCAPRolePerMapping_79f632`.`roleId` = #{roleId}
